items.title: The U.S. stock and bond markets close early on Black Friday
items.description: Thanksgiving week comes with plenty of holiday-adjusted business hours, including, of course on Wall Street — so here’s what you need to know.

items.title: Carnival, NCL and Royal Caribbean all have Black Friday sales. But is now the best time to shop for a cruise deal?
items.description: Some sales extend through Cyber Monday and beyond

items.title: Relentless financial pressure has Black Friday shoppers of all incomes even more hungry for deals than usual today
items.description: After several years of rising prices and economic uncertainty, consumers are more focused on scoring the best deals.

items.title: Scoring great Black Friday deals is getting harder. These 6 tips can help you shop smarter this weekend.
items.description: Deals aren’t as enticing this Black Friday compared with years past — but it’s still possible to find bargains if you know where to look.
